name: n8n-deploy
description: Self deployment for n8n for AD
author: Atharva Devasthali

scripts.add-pkg: sh -c 'pip3.11 install "$0" && echo "$(pip3.11 freeze | grep ^$0==)" >> requirements.txt'
scripts.docker-rm-cache: docker container prune -f && docker image prune -a -f && docker volume prune -f && docker builder prune -a -f
